name: Project H4S73
description:
Project H4S73

The Harmatia Corporation is known for its reputation as one of the leading research facilities in the manipulation of space-time. Like most people, you turned a blind eye to how Harmatia acquired its test subjects, until that is, you became one.

Programmer: Nash Roy

Artist: Jenna Ward & Nathan Pluskota

Level Design: Justin Jusino & Jacob Tye
